alert.note: Alert for Madison; Stanton; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 4:47PM CDT until July 04 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Wayne County in northeastern Nebraska... Northern Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 447 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Battle Creek, or 6 miles southwest of Norfolk, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Norfolk around 455 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Stanton and Hoskins. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
